name: ag-charts-enterprise
description: Advanced Charting / Charts supporting Javascript / Typescript / React / Angular / Vue

scripts.build-cjs: rimraf dist/tsconfig.cjs.es5.docs.tsbuildinfo && npx tsc -p tsconfig.cjs.es5.json && npx tsc -p tsconfig.cjs.es6.json
scripts.build-esm: npx tsc -p tsconfig.esm.es5.json && npx tsc -p tsconfig.esm.es6.json
scripts.build-cjs-prod: npx tsc -p tsconfig.cjs.es5.json --sourceMap false && npx tsc -p tsconfig.cjs.es6.json --sourceMap false
scripts.build-esm-prod: npx tsc -p tsconfig.esm.es5.json --sourceMap false && npx tsc -p tsconfig.esm.es6.json --sourceMap false
scripts.build: npx gulp copy-license-files && npm run build-cjs && npm run build-esm && npm run hash
scripts.build-prod: npx gulp copy-license-files && npm run build-cjs-prod && npm run build-esm-prod && npm run hash

author: Sean Landsman <sean@thelandsmans.com>
